abstract: Stocks make second-biggest gain in 2015, rebounding from large sell-off week earlier.
lead_paragraph: China stocks climbed; and Media General said it would acquire Meredith, while Emera, a Canadian energy company, announced plans to buy Teco Energy.

headline.main: Market Rises on Merger News and a Rebound in China

snippet: China stocks climbed; and Media General said it would acquire Meredith, while Emera, a Canadian energy company, announced plans to buy Teco Energy.
